Package ai.steeringbehaviors.pathfinding

Class Graph

java.lang.Object
ai.steeringbehaviors.pathfinding.Graph
public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object
The Class Graph. This class stores the connections for each node

    • buildGraph

      public static Graph buildGraph​(TileManager tilemanager)
      This method rebuilds the graph with new nodes and connections. This method is called when the terrain is changed as different terrain has different costs or no costs at all

      Returns:
